Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.controller

Class VirtualView

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.controller.VirtualView
Direct Known Subclasses:
VirtualViewStub
public class VirtualView
extends java.lang.Object
This class is an observer of the model: when a model change occurs, Virtual view is notified and it generates a specific a specific update message containing the changes to the clients.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void updateActiveLeaderCard​(int id)
    This method is used to notify the virtual view when a leader card is activated.
    void updateConvertedMarbles​(java.util.ArrayList<Benefit> resources)
    notify the virtual view about the remaining resources to take from the market.
    void updateDevCardDrawn​(Color color, int level, int idNewCard)
    This method is used to notify that a development card has been taken from the decks containing development cards to be bought.
    void updateDevDeck​(int position, int id)
    This method is used to notify the virtual view that a new development card is placed in the dashboard of the current player.
    void updateDiscardLeaderCard​(int id)
    This method is used to notify the virtual view that a leader card is discarded.
    void updateDrawToken​(int id)
    this method is used to notify the virtual view when an action token is drawn
    void updateExtraSlot​(Resource resource, int id, int quantity)
    This method is used to notify the virtual view when an extra slot content changes.
    void updateFaithPath​(java.util.Map<Player,​java.lang.Integer> newPositions)
    This method is used to notify the virtual view about a change of player positions in the faith path.
    void updateLastProduced​(java.util.Map<Resource,​java.lang.Integer> resources)
    This method is used to notify the virtual view about a production success.
    void updateMarketColumn​(Marble[] newColumn, Marble outerMarble, int colPosition)
    This method is used to notify the virtualView after a column changes in the market grid.
    void updateMarketRow​(Marble[] newRow, Marble outerMarble, int rowPosition)
    This method is used to notify the virtualView after a row changes in the market grid.

    This method is used to notify the virtual view when a pope meeting occurs.
    void updateSingleFaithPath​(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Integer> newPositions)  
    void updateStrategies​(int remaining, int id)
    This method is used to notify the virtual view about the number of white marbles that need to be converted.
    void updateStrongbox​(java.util.Map<Resource,​java.lang.Integer> resources)
    This method is used to notify the virtual view about available resources in the strongbox: resources just produced will not be considered here.

    This method is used to notify the virtual view about a change in the warehouse depot

    • VirtualView

      public VirtualView​(Controller controller)

  • Method Details

    • updateMarketColumn

      public void updateMarketColumn​(Marble[] newColumn, Marble outerMarble, int colPosition)
      This method is used to notify the virtualView after a column changes in the market grid.
      Parameters:
      newColumn - array of Marbles that are in the selected column after the change.
      outerMarble - the outer marble obtained after the transformation of the grid.
      colPosition - index of the column changed

    • updateMarketRow

      public void updateMarketRow​(Marble[] newRow, Marble outerMarble, int rowPosition)
      This method is used to notify the virtualView after a row changes in the market grid.
      Parameters:
      newRow - array of Marbles that are in the selected row after the change.
      outerMarble - the outer marble obtained after the transformation of the grid.
      rowPosition - index of the row changed

    • updateStrongbox

      public void updateStrongbox​(java.util.Map<Resource,​java.lang.Integer> resources)
      This method is used to notify the virtual view about available resources in the strongbox: resources just produced will not be considered here.
      Parameters:
      resources - a map containing all the resources that changed with the last quantity registered.

    • updateLastProduced

      public void updateLastProduced​(java.util.Map<Resource,​java.lang.Integer> resources)
      This method is used to notify the virtual view about a production success.
      Parameters:
      resources - Map of resources just produced, with the last quantity registered.

    • updateWarehouseDepot

      public void updateWarehouseDepot​(int shelf, Resource resource, int quantity)
      This method is used to notify the virtual view about a change in the warehouse depot
      Parameters:
      shelf - specific shelf involved in the change.
      resource - new resource placed in the shelf
      quantity - new quantity contained in the shelf.

    • updateMeetingPope

      public void updateMeetingPope​(java.util.Map<Player,​java.lang.Integer> deltaVictoryPoints)
      This method is used to notify the virtual view when a pope meeting occurs.
      Parameters:
      deltaVictoryPoints - victory points earned by each player after the meeting pope.

    • updateFaithPath

      public void updateFaithPath​(java.util.Map<Player,​java.lang.Integer> newPositions)
      This method is used to notify the virtual view about a change of player positions in the faith path.
      Parameters:
      newPositions - map of players that changed their place, with the updated positions.

    • updateSingleFaithPath

      public void updateSingleFaithPath​(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Integer> newPositions)

    • updateExtraSlot

      public void updateExtraSlot​(Resource resource, int id, int quantity)
      This method is used to notify the virtual view when an extra slot content changes.
      Parameters:
      resource - resource of the extraSlot.
      id - id of the leader card that offers the extraSlot
      quantity - new quantity of the resources contained by the extra slot.

    • updateDiscardLeaderCard

      public void updateDiscardLeaderCard​(int id)
      This method is used to notify the virtual view that a leader card is discarded.
      Parameters:
      id - ID of the specific leader card discarded.

    • updateDevDeck

      public void updateDevDeck​(int position, int id)
      This method is used to notify the virtual view that a new development card is placed in the dashboard of the current player.
      Parameters:
      position - specific deck that now contains the development card purchased.
      id - id of the new development card.

    • updateDevCardDrawn

      public void updateDevCardDrawn​(Color color, int level, int idNewCard)
      This method is used to notify that a development card has been taken from the decks containing development cards to be bought.
      Parameters:
      color - color of the card purchased.
      level - level of the card purchased.
      idNewCard - id of the development card purchased.

    • updateActiveLeaderCard

      public void updateActiveLeaderCard​(int id)
      This method is used to notify the virtual view when a leader card is activated.
      Parameters:
      id - ID of the leader card activated by the current player.

    • updateDrawToken

      public void updateDrawToken​(int id)
      this method is used to notify the virtual view when an action token is drawn
      Parameters:
      id - id of the token drawn.

    • updateStrategies

      public void updateStrategies​(int remaining, int id)
      This method is used to notify the virtual view about the number of white marbles that need to be converted.
      Parameters:
      remaining - remaining white marbles.
      id - id of the leader card selected.

    • updateConvertedMarbles

      public void updateConvertedMarbles​(java.util.ArrayList<Benefit> resources)
      notify the virtual view about the remaining resources to take from the market.
      Parameters:
      resources - remaining resources.
